movies.Title: The Lion King
movies.Description: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

movies.Title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
movies.Description: A human child raised by wolves must face off against a menacing tiger named Shere Khan, as well as his own origins.

movies.Title: Doctor Strange
movies.Description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

movies.Title: John Wick
movies.Description: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took his car.

movies.Title: The Notebook
movies.Description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom. However, social differences soon get in the way.
